titles.title: You Gotta Walk This Lonesome Valley

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Jesus walked this lonesome valley,
Jesus walked it by Himself.
No one else could walk it for Him;
Jesus walked it by Himself.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You must go and stand your trial.
You've got to stand it for yourself.
No one else can stand if for you.
You've got to stand it for yourself.
